import cv2
img=cv2.imread('img/hand.png',cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
_,biny=cv2.threshold(img,60,255,0)
laplacian = cv2.Laplacian(biny,cv2.CV_64F)#计算Laplacian边缘
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.imshow("nxw",laplacian)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('sucai6/peppa.png',0)
ret,otsu=cv2.threshold(img,60,255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,1,0,ksize=3)
sobelx = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobelx2 = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,0,1,ksize=3)
sobelx2 = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx2)
c=0.5
sobelx3=cv2.addWeighted(sobelx,c,sobelx2,1-c,0)
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.imshow("sobelx",sobelx)
cv2.imshow("sobelx2",sobelx2)
cv2.imshow("sobelx3",sobelx3)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2

cv2.imshow("laplacian",laplacian)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
image = cv2.imread('img/peppa.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if image is None:
    print("null")
else:
    blurred = cv2.GaussianBlur(image, (3, 3), 0)
    sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(blurred, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
    sobel_x = np.uint8(np.absolute(sobel_x))
    sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(blurred, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
    sobel_y = np.uint8(np.absolute(sobel_y))
    sobel_combined = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x, 0.5, sobel_y, 0.5, 0)
    cv2.imshow('Original Image', image)
    cv2.imshow('Sobel X (Vertical Edges)', sobel_x)
    cv2.imshow('Sobel Y (Horizontal Edges)', sobel_y)
    cv2.imshow('Combined Sobel Edges', sobel_combined)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_x.jpg', sobel_x)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_y.jpg', sobel_y)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_combined.jpg', sobel_combined)
    cv2.waitKey(0)
    cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import os
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
image_folder = 'sucai6'
image_name = 'peppa.png'
image_path = os.path.join(image_folder, image_name)
image = cv2.imread(image_path, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE) 
if image is None:
    print(f"Error: Could not read image {image_path}")
else:
    sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
    sobel_x = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_x)
    sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
    sobel_y = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_y)
    combined_sobel = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x, 0.5, sobel_y, 0.5, 0)
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 8))
    plt.subplot(1, 3, 1)
    plt.title('Sobel X')
    plt.imshow(sobel_x, cmap='gray')
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.subplot(1, 3, 2)
    plt.title('Sobel Y')
    plt.imshow(sobel_y, cmap='gray')
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.subplot(1, 3, 3)
    plt.title('Combined Sobel')
    plt.imshow(combined_sobel, cmap='gray')
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

import cv2
img = cv2.imread('sucai6/hand.png')
gray=cv2.cvtColor(img,cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
_,biny=cv2.threshold(gray,60,255,cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
laplacian=cv2.Laplacian(biny,cv2.CV_64F)
laplacian=cv2.convertScaleAbs(laplacian)
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.imshow("laplacian",laplacian)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('sucai6/peppa.png',0)
sobelx=cv2.Sobel(img,cv2.CV_64F,1,0,ksize=3)
sobelx=cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobely=cv2.Sobel(img,cv2.CV_64F,0,1,ksize=3)
sobely=cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobely)
a=cv2.addWeighted(sobelx,0.5,sobely,0.5,1,sobelx)
cv2.imshow('sobelx',sobelx)
cv2.imshow('sobely',sobely)
cv2.imshow('HJC',a)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
image_path = 'sucai6/peppa.png' 
image = cv2.imread(image_path, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if image is None:
   raise FileNotFoundError(f"无法找到图像文件：{image_path}")
sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
sobel_x = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_x) 
sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
sobel_y = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_y)
blended_image = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x, 0.5, sobel_y, 0.5, 0)
def show_images(images, titles, cmap='gray'):
   plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
   for i, (img, title) in enumerate(zip(images, titles)):
       plt.subplot(1, len(images), i + 1)
       plt.imshow(img, cmap=cmap)
       plt.title(title)
       plt.axis('off')
   plt.show()
show_images([sobel_x, sobel_y, blended_image],
           ["Sobel X (Horizontal Edges)", "Sobel Y (Vertical Edges)", "Blended Edges"])
cv2.imwrite('sobel_x.jpg', sobel_x)
cv2.imwrite('sobel_y.jpg', sobel_y)
cv2.imwrite('blended_edges.jpg', blended_image)

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('sucai6/hand.png')
gray=cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
ret, thresh1 = cv2.threshold(gray, 60, 255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
laplacian=cv2.Laplacian(thresh1,cv2.CV_64F)
laplacian2=cv2.convertScaleAbs(laplacian)
cv2.imshow('img',img)
cv2.imshow('laplacian2',laplacian2)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

cv2.imshow('yam',end)

import cv2
image = cv2.imread('img/peppa.png')
gray = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(gray, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
sobely = cv2.Sobel(gray, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
sobelx_8u = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobely_8u = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobely)
fused_edges = cv2.addWeighted(sobelx_8u, 0.5, sobely_8u, 0.5, 0)
cv2.imshow('LHK_sobelx_8u', sobelx_8u)
cv2.imshow('LHK_sobely_8u', sobely_8u)
cv2.imshow('LHK', fused_edges)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
image_path = 'sucai6/peppa.png' 
image = cv2.imread(image_path, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if image is None:
    raise FileNotFoundError(f"无法找到图像文件：{image_path}")
sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
sobel_x = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_x) 
sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(image, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
sobel_y = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_y)
blended_image = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x, 0.5, sobel_y, 0.5, 0)
def show_images(images, titles, cmap='gray'):
    plt.figure(figsize=(12, 8))
    for i, (img, title) in enumerate(zip(images, titles)):
        plt.subplot(1, len(images), i + 1)
        plt.imshow(img, cmap=cmap)
        plt.title(title)
        plt.axis('off')
    plt.show()
show_images([sobel_x, sobel_y, blended_image],
            ["Sobel X (Horizontal Edges)", "Sobel Y (Vertical Edges)", "Blended Edges"])
cv2.imwrite('sobel_x.jpg', sobel_x)
cv2.imwrite('sobel_y.jpg', sobel_y)
cv2.imwrite('blended_edges.jpg', blended_image)

import cv2
import numpy as np
img = cv2.imread('img/peppa.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(img, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=5)
sobely = cv2.Sobel(img, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=5)
sobelx_abs = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobely_abs = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobely)
combined_edges = cv2.addWeighted(sobelx_abs, 0.5, sobely_abs, 0.5, 0)
cv2.imshow("Original Image", img)
cv2.imshow("Horizontal Edges", sobelx_abs)
cv2.imshow("Vertical Edges", sobely_abs)
cv2.imshow("Combined Edges", combined_edges)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
img = cv2.imread('peppa.png',0)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,0,1,ksize=3)
sobelx1 = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,1,0,ksize=3)

cv2.imshow("sobelx1",sobelx1)

import cv2
img=cv2.imread('sucai6/peppa.png',0)
ret,otsu=cv2.threshold(img,60,255, cv2.THRESH_BINARY_INV)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,1,0,ksize=3)
sobelx = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobelx2 = cv2.Sobel(img,-1,0,1,ksize=3)
sobelx2 = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx2)
c=0.5
sobelx3=cv2.addWeighted(sobelx,c,sobelx2,1-c,0)
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.imshow("sobelx",sobelx)
cv2.imshow("sobelx2",sobelx2)
cv2.imshow("sobelx3",sobelx3)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
image = cv2.imread('hand.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if image is None:
    print("null")
else:
    laplacian = cv2.Laplacian(image, cv2.CV_64F, ksize=3)
    laplacian = np.uint8(np.absolute(laplacian))
    cv2.imshow('Original Image', image)
    cv2.imshow('Laplacian Edge Detection', laplacian)
    cv2.waitKey(0)
    cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
image = cv2.imread('peppa.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
if image is None:
    print("null")
else:
    blurred = cv2.GaussianBlur(image, (3, 3), 0)
    sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(blurred, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=3)
    sobel_x = np.uint8(np.absolute(sobel_x))
    sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(blurred, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=3)
    sobel_y = np.uint8(np.absolute(sobel_y))
    sobel_combined = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x, 0.5, sobel_y, 0.5, 0)
    cv2.imshow('Original Image', image)
    cv2.imshow('Sobel X (Vertical Edges)', sobel_x)
    cv2.imshow('Sobel Y (Horizontal Edges)', sobel_y)
    cv2.imshow('Combined Sobel Edges', sobel_combined)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_x.jpg', sobel_x)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_y.jpg', sobel_y)
    cv2.imwrite('img/peppa_sobel_combined.jpg', sobel_combined)
    cv2.waitKey(0)
    cv2.destroyAllWindows()

#常见的数字图像要复杂得多，如果想要获取其边缘，则要结合阈值进行处理。本任务要求编写程序获取图像边缘，效果如图所示。

import cv2
img = cv2.imread('hand.png',cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)
_, biny = cv2.threshold(img,60,255,0)
cv2.imshow("biny",biny)
laplacian = cv2.Laplacian(biny,cv2.CV_64F)#计算Laplacian边缘
cv2.imshow("biny",biny)
cv2.imshow("laplacian",laplacian)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np

# 读取图像，转换为灰度图
img = cv2.imread('peppa.png', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE)

# 检查图像是否成功加载
if img is None:
    print("Error: Could not read image 'img/peppa.png'. Check the file path.")
    exit()

# 使用 Sobel 算子提取横向边缘
sobel_x = cv2.Sobel(img, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize=5)  # 横向边缘
sobel_y = cv2.Sobel(img, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize=5)  # 纵向边缘

# 转换为绝对值的 8 位图像
sobel_x_abs = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_x)
sobel_y_abs = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobel_y)

# 保存截图
cv2.imwrite('img/sobel_x.png', sobel_x_abs)
cv2.imwrite('img/sobel_y.png', sobel_y_abs)

# 融合横向和纵向边缘
combined = cv2.addWeighted(sobel_x_abs, 0.5, sobel_y_abs, 0.5, 0)

# 保存融合图像
cv2.imwrite('img/combined_edges.png', combined)

# 显示结果
cv2.imshow("Sobel X", sobel_x_abs)
cv2.imshow("Sobel Y", sobel_y_abs)
cv2.imshow("Combined Edges", combined)

# 等待键盘输入并关闭窗口
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

题目1.正确答案:
正确答案：
import cv2
img = cv2.imread('./img/hand.png',0)
retval,threshod = cv2.threshold(img,60,255,0)
laplacian = cv2.Laplacian(threshod,cv2.CV_64F)#计算Laplacian边缘
laplacian3 = cv2.convertScaleAbs(laplacian)
cv2.imshow("img",img)
cv2.imshow("laplacian",laplacian3)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

text:
下载附件并解压，读取img文件夹下的"hand"，使用Laplacian算子提取其边缘。
提交完整代码和截图。

题目2.正确答案:
正确答案：
import cv2
peppa = cv2.imread("./img/peppa.png", 0)
sobelx = cv2.Sobel(peppa, cv2.CV_64F, 0, 1)
sobelx = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobelx)
sobely = cv2.Sobel(peppa, cv2.CV_64F, 1, 0)
sobely = cv2.convertScaleAbs(sobely)
sobel_demo = cv2.addWeighted(sobelx, 0.5, sobely, 0.5, 0)
cv2.imshow("JXJ_sobelx", sobelx)
cv2.imshow("JXJ_sobely", sobely)
cv2.imshow("JXJ_sobel_demo", sobel_demo)
cv2.waitKey()
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

text:
读取img文件夹下的"peppa"，使用Sobel算子：
- 分别提取其横向边缘和纵向边缘，并分别截图。
- 使用“addWeighted”方法（项目二）将两种不同边缘融合成一张图像，截图。
提交完整代码和截图。
截图参考：
